code: import{SET_IS_FORM_MODAL_ACTIVE}from"./actions";import produce from'immer';var initialState={isModalActive:false};var formModalReducer=function formModalReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_IS_FORM_MODAL_ACTIVE:{return produce(state,function(draftState){draftState.isModalActive=action.payload;});}default:{return state;}}};export default formModalReducer;
